snippet: France renewed a promise that its soldiers would begin returning home within weeks, just as new hostilities erupted with Islamist militants.
abstract: French and Malian troops clash with Islamist militants in northern Mali as France promises to withdraw its troops within weeks, handing over authority to West African and Malian units charged with keeping vast desert area under government control.

byline.original: By SCOTT SAYARE and ALAN COWELL

lead_paragraph: France renewed a promise that its soldiers would begin returning home within weeks, just as new hostilities erupted with Islamist militants.

headline.seo: New Skirmishes Reported in Mali as France Promises Withdrawal
headline.main: As Mali Fighting Persists, France Vows to Exit in Weeks
headline.print_headline: As Mali Fighting Persists, France Vows to Exit in Weeks
